text:
What do people use to setup a new computer these days?
I used to have a bash script with my dotfiles, but that is super out of date now; plus bash is not idempotent, i hear the new tools for this are?
Like I want to install tmux, neovim, gnu stow, and then trigger stow to setup my dotfiles.
